General.Name: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of automotives and related vehicles, and spare parts in Turkey and internationally. The company provides trucks, minivans, autonomous bus, and electric and diesel busses. It also offers after-sales and marketing services. The company sells its products under the JEST, ATAK, and STAR brand names. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Kiraça Holding A.S.
General.Address: Hasanaga Organize Sanayi BOelgesi, Bursa, Turkey, 16225
